name: purpleheart
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a rare South or Central American tree with very hard wood: In place of the purpleheart that he has cut down, he plans to plant pineapple. The purplehearts are found in Trinidad and Suriname. We were staying on the edge of a forest of purpleheart trees.
[ U ] the very hard, purple-brown wood of the purpleheart tree, used for making furniture : He's working on a coffee table made from purpleheart with ebony and silver inlay. The benches are made of treated purpleheart wood. See also
Purple Heart
More examplesFewer examplesHe claimed that the company had been removing purpleheart logs from the forest illegally.The purpleheart trees are among this rainforest's most valuable timber.
